about_the_game:
Not far from the Baltic coast lies the beautiful Amber Lake. According to local legends, the name derives from the numerous carp inhabiting it, whose scales glisten in the sunlight like amber. This lake is now very popular with friends of modern carp fishing.

In this DLC you can expect:

A new body of water:

  • Amber Lake - The completely accessible Amber Lake with many comfortable fishing spots is an Eldorado for carp anglers and will put your fighting technique to a new test.

New fish species:

  • Linear carp
  • Frame-sided carp
  • Red carp (Scale und Mirror versions)
  • Albino variant:
    - Common carp
    - Mirror carp
    - Linear carp
    - Leather carp
    - Frame-sided carp
  • Ghost variant:
    - Common carp
    - Mirror carp
    - Linear carp
    - Leather carp
    - Frame-sided carp

New vehicle:

  • To reach distant fishing spots, you have the opportunity to rent a quad.
detailed_description:
Not far from the Baltic coast lies the beautiful Amber Lake. According to local legends, the name derives from the numerous carp inhabiting it, whose scales glisten in the sunlight like amber. This lake is now very popular with friends of modern carp fishing.

In this DLC you can expect:

A new body of water:

  • Amber Lake - The completely accessible Amber Lake with many comfortable fishing spots is an Eldorado for carp anglers and will put your fighting technique to a new test.

New fish species:

  • Linear carp
  • Frame-sided carp
  • Red carp (Scale und Mirror versions)
  • Albino variant:
    - Common carp
    - Mirror carp
    - Linear carp
    - Leather carp
    - Frame-sided carp
  • Ghost variant:
    - Common carp
    - Mirror carp
    - Linear carp
    - Leather carp
    - Frame-sided carp

New vehicle:

  • To reach distant fishing spots, you have the opportunity to rent a quad.
name: Russian Fishing 4 - Amber Lake

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® i5 3Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® i5 3.5Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: Amber Lake – This reservoir offers a large number of comfortable fishing spots and of course many exciting new carp species. All common methods and baits, that make carp fishing so special, will now be available. The new quad will enable you to comfortably reach even remote fishing spots.
supported_languages: English, German, Russian, Simplified Chinese, French, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Dutch, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Japanese
